name: SleepNoiseForestNight
0:
”Alexa, open sleep noise forest night”
”Alexa, start sleep noise forest night”
”Alexa, launch sleep noise forest night”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep noise forest night
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Noise Forest Night lets you reproduce relaxing audio tracks of a forest at night. Crickets and birds are waiting for you! Relax your mind with this wonderful skill!

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram! Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
